author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two youths, who went for a swim in Bay of Bengal off the Tiruvottiyur coast, drowned on Monday. One of their friends was rescued, while another is missing.

Police said Mani (17), Surya (14), Bhuvanesh (17) and Dinesh (14), from Tiruvottiyur, were swimming when a wave dragged them deep into water. Hearing their cries, fishermen rushed to help, but were able to rescue only Dinesh.

While the bodies of Mani and Surya were washed ashore, Bhuvanesh is missing.

Arrested

Around 30 members of Tamizhaga Vazhvurimai Katchi were arrested for climbing on top of hoardings in Villivakkam and Kilpauk, protesting against the naming of Velmurugan, their party MLA, in an FIR in connection with the murder attempt on a PMK functionary in Cuddalore recently. They were later released.
title: Two drown in sea, one missing
